Rekingen AG railway station () is a railway station in the Swiss canton of Aargau and municipality of Rekingen. The station is located on the Winterthur to Koblenz line of Swiss Federal Railways.
Services
the following services stop at Rekingen AG:
* Zürich S-Bahn : hourly service between  and .
